column5: Just wanted to say a quick thanks to the admins at OFC It is awesome that this site is optimized for mobile phones! I've got a 2 year old who likes to wake up at 630 every morning so being able to browse through my BB while she watches Toopy and Binoo helps!
I use the Mobile site while I'm out of town all the time. ... I just tell people i'm reading/sending emails.
I watch the Teletubbies. But hey, thank you.
Funny, i took you as more of a Bugs Bunny kinda guy
Yah, roy does resemble yosemite sam!
I'm not that high tech yet but I can appreciate where it would be a cool feature.  BTW Chad - I follow around and correct that fib for you -  I tell them you're really watching Blue's Clues.  Michael
He's one clever pup, you can't argue that!
oh man that's awful. No plot, no sub humour for adults to pick up. you might as well watch "In the Night Garden"
For sure -she loved that show too She's showing an interest in Handy Manny-better viewing
